short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save up to 90% on flights. Get price data so you know to book or wait.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cheep overlays cost per mile data on the cheapest fare on Google Flights searches. A cost per mile under 6 cents per mile is the best fare for each dollar. This is a great indicator for nomadic travel where destination is not as important as price per dollar. 

 For popular routes, our analysis of over 1M+ fares to/from over 200+ destinations, the lowest 20th percentile indicates fares should be under 11 cents per mile. This is if you have target destination in mind, this indicator tells you to buy or not.
